pageContext.quote: When you see someone often flashing their rank or position, or someonewhose name is often bandied about in public, don't be envious; such thingsare bought at the expense of life. Some die on the first rungs of theladder of success, others before they can reach the top, and the few thatmake it to the top of their ambition through a thousand indignities realizeat the end it's only for an inscription on their gravestone.
